title: Take This Quick Survey to Help Us Help You Shop Smarter
text: You may have read a post or two (or many!) on The Daily Beast about products to shop for and brands that you might like. We’ve already learned that you love elevated yet practical brands like Everlane and Allbirds, love a good Nordstrom Rack sale, and are actually quite intrigued by the new booming world of CBD. But what else are you interested in? What other products should we be helping you shop for? If you have 5 minutes, please take this quick survey to tell us a bit more about your interests.
description: Tell us more about yourselves so we can curate a better mix of products and brands – just for you.
